column4: under which category can i find my nvidia drivers at http://packages.ubuntu.com/gutsy/ ???
under which category can i find my nvidia drivers at the packages website ?
under which category can i find my nvidia drivers at the ubuntu packages site?
To enable advanced customization of desktop effects in Gutsy(7.10) install 'compizconfig-settings-manager' - A new option will appear in your appearance properties - see also !compiz
